body:
Figured out how to build from source based on https://github.com/takluyver/flit/compare/doc-bootstrap. Unfortunately the PyPI tarball doesn't have the necessary file, so we have to build from a GitHub tarball.

Still haven't figured out how to build `py-flit` from source without setuptools. I think we need to implement PEP-517 support at some point. I would rather avoid using `pip` for everything.
title: py-flit-core: build from source
